newsitem.title: POLAND: POLISH MOSTOSTAL KRAKOW TO ENTER BOURSE JAN 14.
newsitem.headline: POLISH MOSTOSTAL KRAKOW TO ENTER BOURSE JAN 14.

text.p: Polish construction company Mostostal Krakow SA will enter the Warsaw Stock Exchange on January 14, PAP news agency quoted the bourse's president as saying.
"On January 14 Mostostal Krakow shares will enter the main market of the Warsaw bourse," PAP quoted Wieslaw Rozlucki as saying.
Mostostal Krakow's 9.32 million shares were approved for public trade at the end of last year. The firm did not carry out its initial public offering.
Mostostal Krakow estimated its net profit at 4.2 million zlotys last year and expected to reach 5.5 million zlotys this year, up from 2.1 million zlotys in 1995.
PAP also said poultry producer Indykpol would move from the parallel to the main market on January 13.
